name: Brisingr Aerowing's Blog - Home
body:
# Welcome to my Blog!

As you can see, there is not much here right now. I am working on some projects, and will post more information on them as they progress.

Project List (As of 9/22/2014)
 * ScriptPad - A basic code editor with many features (Early Planning)
 * Web Editor - A Website editor with many features (Early Planning)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
